Command

{% raw %}

class Command[source]

Command(name)

A shell command.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ls = Command('ls')
test_eq(ls(), '00_core.ipynb\nCONTRIBUTING.md\ndocker-compose.yml\ndocs\nindex.ipynb\nLICENSE\nMANIFEST.in\nREADME.md\nsettings.ini\nsetup.py')
{% endraw %}

Shell

{% raw %}

class Shell[source]

Shell()

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sh = Shell()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(sh.ls(), '00_core.ipynb\nCONTRIBUTING.md\ndocker-compose.yml\ndocs\nindex.ipynb\nLICENSE\nMANIFEST.in\nREADME.md\nsettings.ini\nsetup.py')
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(sh.ls('\.giti*', flags='a'), '.gitignore')
{% endraw %}

from nbdev.export import notebook2script; notebook2script()
